text: But even if I wanted to boast, I would not be a fool, for I would be speaking the truth. Nevertheless, I refrain so that no one will think more of me than what he sees in me or hears from 12:6-7 me. And to keep me from becoming conceited because of the surpassing greatness of the revelations I received, Â¦ me, even considering the surpassing greatness of the revelations I received. Therefore, to keep me from becoming conceited, CTme.
